entities.label: Gross Global Scope 1 Emissions and Perfluorinated Compounds

properties.description: (1) Gross global Scope 1 emissions and (2) amount of total emissions from perfluorinated compounds

Composite metric consolidating gross global Scope 1 GHG emissions and the specific amount from perfluorinated compounds (PFCs), calculated in accordance with GHG Protocol and IPCC Fifth Assessment Report
input_variables: Amount of emissions from perfluorinated compounds

properties.description: Gross global Scope 1 greenhouse gas emissions to the atmosphere of the seven GHGs covered under the Kyoto Protocol, consolidated in metric tonnes of carbon dioxide equivalents
Gross global Scope 1 GHG emissions originated from perfluorinated compounds (PFCs)
Discussion of long- and short-term strategy or plan to manage Scope 1 emissions, emissions reduction targets, and an analysis of performance against those targets
(1) Total energy consumed, (2) percentage grid electricity and (3) percentage renewable
Composite metric derived from total energy consumed, with calculated percentages for grid electricity and renewable energy consumption.
properties.equation: Grid % = Grid Electricity / Total Energy; Renewable % = Renewable Energy / Total Energy

properties.description: Total amount of energy consumed as an aggregate figure, including energy from all sources (purchased and self-generated)
Amount of energy consumed that was supplied from purchased grid electricity
Amount of energy consumed from renewable sources (geothermal, wind, solar, hydro, biomass)

entities.label: Water Withdrawn and Consumed in High Stress Regions

properties.description: (1) Total water withdrawn, (2) total water consumed; percentage of each in regions with High or Extremely High Baseline Water Stress
Composite metric calculating total water withdrawn and consumed, with percentage of each occurring in regions with High or Extremely High Baseline Water Stress
Total volume of water withdrawn from all locations
Total volume of water consumed in all locations
The entity shall analyse all of its operations for water risks and identify activities that withdraw and consume water in locations with High (4080%) or Extremely High (>80%) Baseline Water Stress

entities.label: Water Withdrawn in High Stress Areas (Percentage)

properties.description: Water withdrawn in locations with High or Extremely High Baseline Water Stress as a percentage of the total water withdrawn
Calculates the percentage of water withdrawn from high stress locations relative to total water withdrawn
properties.equation: (Water withdrawn in high stress areas / Total water withdrawn)  100
input_variables: Water withdrawn in high stress areas

entities.label: Water Withdrawn in High Stress Areas

properties.description: Total volume of water withdrawn in locations with High or Extremely High Baseline Water Stress

entities.label: Water Consumed in High Stress Areas (Percentage)

properties.description: Water consumed in locations with High or Extremely High Baseline Water Stress as a percentage of the total water consumed
Calculates the percentage of water consumed in high stress locations relative to total water consumed
properties.equation: (Water consumed in high stress areas / Total water consumed)  100
input_variables: Water consumed in high stress areas

entities.label: Water Consumed in High Stress Areas

properties.description: Total volume of water consumed in locations with High or Extremely High Baseline Water Stress
(1) Amount of hazardous waste from manufacturing, (2) percentage recycled
Calculates the percentage of hazardous waste recycled by dividing the weight of recycled hazardous waste by the total weight of hazardous waste generated
properties.equation: (Hazardous waste recycled / Total hazardous waste generated)  100

properties.description: The total weight of hazardous waste generated, in metric tonnes, from manufacturing operations
The weight of hazardous waste generated from manufacturing operations that was recycled
